sentences.en: " It is a bit of quiet , unassuming drollery which warms like good wine.
sentences.cn: " 这是一段既不哗众取宠又不矫揉造作的滑稽表演,像美酒一样温馨.

sentences.en: A warm yet unassuming hospitality still awaits.
sentences.cn: 热情而不做作,我们盛意恭候您的光临.

sentences.en: Despite his position, he has an unassuming personality.
sentences.cn: 虽然有地位, 但他为人谦逊.

sentences.en: He was a gentle, lowly, and unassuming man.
sentences.cn: 他是个温和 、 谦卑 、 不摆架子的人.

sentences.en: He was a small and to all appearances an unassuming man.
sentences.cn: 他个子小，看上去不事张扬。

sentences.en: He's a man of few words, very polite and unassuming.
sentences.cn: 他话不多，很有礼貌，为人谦和。

sentences.en: I also believe that a simple and unassuming life is good for everybody, physically and mentally.
sentences.cn: 我还认为简单朴素、不事张扬的生活方式,对任何人的身心都有好处.

sentences.en: I also believe that simple and unassuming life is good for everybody, physically and mentally.
sentences.cn: 我还相信,俭朴的生活对每个人都是有益的, 无论是在身体上还是在精神上.

sentences.en: It was an unassuming shop, registered under the vague name of Drapery.
sentences.cn: 这是一家不显眼的商店, 招牌上笼统地称作服装店.

sentences.en: Ji won affection from general public also for his unassuming personality and humility.
sentences.cn: 不止于此,季先生广受爱戴的原因还在于他谦逊的个性.

sentences.en: She has a gentle, unassuming manner.
Successful traders are sharp unassuming people.
sentences.cn: 成功的交易者是犀利的,认真的,无法想象的人.

sentences.en: That important man is very unassuming in his manner.
sentences.cn: 那个要人彬彬有礼,是一位毫不摆架子的人.

sentences.en: Unassuming, good listeners usually adopt the starfish on the back with outstretched arms and legs.
sentences.cn: 谦逊忠实的听众通常选择仰卧且四肢伸展的海星式睡姿.

trans.tran_cn: 谦逊的，不装腔作势的，不招摇的，平易
trans.tran_en: showing no desire to be noticed or given special treatment
